pre_caption: In an extreme wide shot from a high-angle, overhead perspective, a pixel-art character initially stands in the center of the frame, positioned in the middle ground of a grassy clearing. This clearing is surrounded by pine trees and bushes and is bordered by a river and sandy shore, which occupy the top and bottom-right portions of the frame. As the character walks, the camera pans to follow, first moving slightly down and left. The camera then pans up and to the left, revealing a cliff edge with a pink-blossomed tree in the left middle ground. Finally, the camera follows the character as they walk down and left towards the lower riverbank, keeping the character relatively centered throughout the sequence. Static UI elements remain fixed in the top-right corner and at the bottom of the frame.
